title: Should SpoolDAO accept and adopt the cumulative vote set forth
body:
# Spool DAO Cumulative Vote #01
 
This vote will be a cumulative vote to approve existing and planned developments of Spool and will ensure that operations are governed solely by the will of the Spool DAO. By voting YES to this proposal, the voting Spool DAO member agrees to all the statements within the proposal and agrees that Spool is managed according to the governance of the Spool DAO. 
 
This is a PASS/NOPASS vote for Spool DAO based on the holdings of PreSPL in a PreSPL holder’s wallet using the Aragon voting platform.
 
## 1) PreSPL to voSPOOL to SPOOL
PreSPL tokens will be deprecated after Spool Launches and a new voting token (voSPOOL) will be created to take its place. voSPOOL will be used for Spool DAO voting after PreSPL is deprecated.
 
voSPOOL tokens will be distributed on a 1:1 basis according to the PreSPL in the Spool DAO Cumulative Vote #01 active voter’s wallet and will be delivered to active voters through a wallet the active voter selects after this vote concludes and offers the same voting rights as PreSPL had before being deprecated. 
To avoid any confusion, a list of wallet addresses will be published in a future vote to determine which wallets will receive voSPOOL.  
 
 
## 2) Spool Token Vesting
After the SPOOL token launches, SPOOL tokens will be released to voSPOOL holders according to a vesting contract that will unlock SPOOL tokens equally over 2 years on a linear block by block basis. 
 
SPOOL tokens can be claimed by interacting with the vesting contract using the wallet specified by the active voter for their voSPOOL distribution. When claiming SPOOL tokens, an equivalent amount of voSPOOL tokens will be burned in the member’s address.
 
 
## 3) Spool.Fi Domain Name
SpoolDAO will adopt the Spool.Fi domain name. 
The Spool.Fi domain will be used for various purposes including but not limited to: providing information on Spool and its partners, hosting of materials relating to Spool, providing the DAPP interface for Spool to the user base, used for the launching of an LBP, providing a base of operations for voting proposals and discourse, as well as other uses. 
 
 
## 4) Spool Litepaper, Website, and Project Information
The current Spool.Fi website, and Spool litepaper, which can be found on the Spool.Fi website, is correct and portrays Spool DAO’s vision for Spool and its future development. This includes the Spool Outline, how Spool will work, the Spool Ecosystem, Spool Labs and the Spool Labs Risk Model, Spool DAO, the Spool token (Ticker name, distribution, reward mechanics, utility, and other information), Genesis Spools, the current iteration of the Spool Roadmap, as well as other information about how Spool should operate.
 
 
## 5) The current Spool roadmap within the litepaper is correct and reflects Spool DAO’s current projected outline of the project. 
 
**Alpha 1.0 (Q3 - 2021)**
 
Spool Genesis Pool Front End UI
Deposits, Withdrawals, Staking Functions
SPOOL Reward Distribution
Risk Model 1: Designed by Spool Labs
SPOOL Vault: SPOOL Stakers receive a % of yield generated in all Spools 
SPOOL Vault Front End
 
 
**Alpha 1.5 (Q4 - 2021)**
 
Assisted Partner Spools
Improved Spool DAO infrastructure 
SDK for Front End Integrations
 
 
**Beta 2.0 (Q1 - 2022)**
 
User Generated Spools
Customizable User Interface
Public Spool Market (SpoolIndex)
DAO Approved Alternative Risk Models
DAO Governed Partner SPOOL Rewards
Risk Model Scripting Environment PoC
 
 
## 6) Spool Fee Structure
A 10% fee on yield will be applied to all Spools according to the yield the Spool generated for an active user. The resulting fee will be distributed 20/80. 20% of the fee will be allocated to the SPOOL DAO Treasury and the remaining 80% of the fee will be allocated as rewards to SPOOL Staking Pool Participants in the form of SPOOL/DAI Liquidity Pool tokens. 
 
Example: If a Spool user generates 10% in yield on $100, the user generates $10 in gross yield. 
If there is a 10% fee on yield generated through a user’s active Spool, the fee will equal $1. 
 
From the $1 fee, $0.20 will be distributed to the SPOOL DAO Treasury, and $0.80 will be converted to SPOOL/DAI LP tokens which will then be distributed to SPOOL Staking Pool Participants. 
 
The user will net $9 in yield, for a 9% net yield. 
 
The Spool user may also incur additional fees including but not limited to: the Risk Model fee, the Spool Creator’s fee, or other fees which will always be explicitly stated and are stored within the Spool’s smart contract.   
 
## 7) SPOOL DAO members are encouraged to present the benefits of Spool at various industry events and conferences.
author: 0x671D2cEa018d2CD541a4466340C7733A50db8433
